data.name: This rain will never end Demo
data.detailed_description:
First, the Mayor of the city hanged himself.
Then the endless rain started.
And now someone knocking on my door. Who could it be?

You are in a noir adventure game where you will play a cat detective who needs to investigate the suicide of the Mayor of Sunny city. Suddenly the rain started to drop endlessly and no one knows why.

So you are in the game now and will have to find a killer by:

  • Combining pieces of evidence
  • Resolving puzzles
  • Comparing fingerprints
  • Making DNA tests
  • Talking to people
  • Playing skills.
Hope you'll like the adventure. Step in!
SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

fullgame.name: This rain will never end - noir adventure detective

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 610 / Intel (R) HD Graphics 5300
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
